
# Materials {.unnumbered}

In this section, we provide a list of materials that can be useful for learning how to use the [`{tidyverse}`](https://www.tidyverse.org/), and how to create Shiny applications.

## Tidyverse

- Book [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/), by Hadley Wickham, Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel, and Garrett Grolemund.


## Shiny

- Tutorial [Shiny for R](https://shiny.posit.co/r/getstarted/shiny-basics/lesson1/), by Posit.

- Book [Mastering Shiny](https://mastering-shiny.org/), by Hadley Wickham.

- Book [Engineering Production-Grade Shiny Apps](https://engineering-shiny.org/),  by Colin Fay, Sébastien Rochette, Vincent Guyader and Cervan Girard.
